checks.label: Duplicate payment verification
checks.detail: 30 high-confidence groups (£606.9K). Duplicate ratio: 0.1%. Filtered out: 32 batch payments, 2776 CSV overlaps.

checks.label: Split payment analysis
checks.detail: 12 suspect instances (£2.6M, 1.4% of spend). Threshold: 5+ payments to same supplier in same week, 80%+ of approval limit.

checks.label: Year-end spike verification
checks.detail: Highest spike: 3.4x in ENVIRONMENT AND PLACE. Year-end spikes are common in public sector (capital programmes, grants). Only extreme spikes (>3x) warrant concern.

checks.label: CH compliance — pre-breach only
checks.detail: 8 suppliers have current breaches, but all payments were made before breaches started. Not violations at time of payment.

checks.label: Cross-council price comparison
checks.detail: 13 shared suppliers found. 3 with >200% price gap (requiring 3+ transactions each side). Extreme disparities (>10,000%) filtered as different service scopes.

checks.label: Benford's Law forensic screening
checks.detail: Significant deviation from Benford's Law (p < 0.001). χ²=7987.83 on 32196 amounts >£100. Largest deviation: digit 5 (9.2% off expected).

warnings: 3 suppliers show >200% price disparity after filtering. These are more likely genuine value concerns than extreme outliers.

Benford's Law analysis shows significant deviation (χ²=7987.83). Digit 5 deviates 9.2% from expected. This warrants investigation but can also occur with legitimate round-number grants or threshold-based payments.
